owl:Ontology.dc:creator: Science and Technology Facilities Council
owl:Ontology.dc:description:
OWL Classes

There are currently 11 classes in the ontology, each of which represents an entry in the DRS as well a two object properties to link sensors and platforms.
OWL Classes

Concept Schemes

The named individuals of each class are also represented as concepts in SKOS concept schemes: data type, ecv, frequency, institutes, platforms, platform groups, platform programs, processing levels, products, projects, and sensors. The use of a concept scheme allows easy navigation up and down the tree as well as providing relationships to concepts from other DRS. As well as relationships between sensors and platforms, each ECV concept is related to one or more data type concepts.

SKOS Navigation Down the Concept Scheme
SKOS Navigation Up the Concept Scheme

Collections

The named individuals of each class are also represented as members in SKOS collections: data type, ecv, frequency, institutes, platforms, platform groups, platform programs, processing levels, products, projects, and sensors. As well as relationships between sensors and platforms, each ECV concept is related to one or more data type concepts.

SKOS Collections

owl:Ontology.dc:title: The CCI Ontology
owl:Ontology.rdfs:comment: This ontology represents the Directory Reference Scheme (DRS) used by the ESA Climate Change Initiative CCI project.
owl:Ontology.rdfs:label: CCI Ontology

owl:Class.dc:description: The main data type in a data set used by the ESA Climate Change Initiative (CCI).
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Geophysical Quantity

owl:Class.dc:description: The Essential Climate Variable (ECVs) in the ESA Climate Change Initiative ( CCI ).
owl:Class.rdfs:label: ECV

owl:Class.dc:description: Temporal frequencies of data from the ESA Climate Change Initiative (CCI).
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Frequency

owl:Class.dc:description: Organisations (institutions) that are involved in production of data for the ESA Climate Change Initiative (CCI).
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Institute

owl:Class.dc:description: The platforms that have been used in the collection of data for the ESA Climate Change Initiative (CCI).
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Platform

owl:Class.dc:description: The platform groups that have been used in the collection of data for the ESA Climate Change Initiative (CCI). A group consists of a number of programmes
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Platform Group

owl:Class.dc:description: The platform programmes that have been used in the collection of data for the ESA Climate Change Initiative (CCI). A programme consists of a number of platforms
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Platform Programme

owl:Class.dc:description: The different processing levels of satellite observational data that are used within the ESA Climate Change Initiative (CCI).
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Processing Level

owl:Class.dc:description: The different products that are produced within the ESA Climate Change Initiative (CCI).
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Product

owl:Class.dc:description: The different projects within the ESA Climate Change Initiative (CCI).
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Project

owl:Class.dc:description: The sensors that have been used in the collection of the data for the ESA Climate Change Initiative (CCI).
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Sensor

owl:NamedIndividual.skos:definition: Unprocessed instrument and payload data at full resolution. CCI does not make recommendations regarding formats or content for data at this processing level.

owl:NamedIndividual.skos:definition: Reconstructed unprocessed instrument data at full resolution, time referenced, and annotated with ancillary information, including radiometric and geometric calibration coefficients and georeferencing parameters, computed and appended, but not applied, to L0 data.
owl:NamedIndividual.skos:scopeNote: Reconstructed unprocessed instrument data at full resolution, time referenced, and annotated with ancillary information, including radiometric and geometric calibration coefficients and georeferencing parameters, computed and appended, but not applied, to L0 data.

owl:NamedIndividual.skos:definition: Level 1A data that have been processed to sensor units.
owl:NamedIndividual.skos:scopeNote: Level 1A data that have been processed to sensor units.

owl:NamedIndividual.skos:definition: Level 1b data that have been further processed, e.g. by correcting radiances or by mapping onto a spatial grid, prior to deriving geophysical variables from the data.
owl:NamedIndividual.skos:scopeNote: Level 1b data that have been further processed, e.g. by correcting radiances or by mapping onto a spatial grid, prior to deriving geophysical variables from the data.

owl:NamedIndividual.skos:definition: Retrieved environmental variables at the same resolution and location as the level 1 source
owl:NamedIndividual.skos:scopeNote: Retrieved environmental variables at the same resolution and location as the level 1 source

owl:NamedIndividual.skos:definition: Geophysical variables derived from Level 1 source data at the same resolution and location as the level 1 data, typically in a satellite projection with geographic information. These data form the fundamental basis for higher level CCI products.
owl:NamedIndividual.skos:scopeNote: Geophysical variables derived from Level 1 source data at the same resolution and location as the level 1 data, typically in a satellite projection with geographic information. These data form the fundamental basis for higher level CCI products.

owl:NamedIndividual.skos:definition: Level 2 variables mapped on a defined grid with reduced requirements for ancillary data. Three types of L3 products are defined.
owl:NamedIndividual.skos:scopeNote: Level 2 variables mapped on a defined grid with reduced requirements for ancillary data. Three types of L3 products are defined.

owl:NamedIndividual.skos:definition: Collated (L3C): Observations combined from a single instrument into a space-time grid.
owl:NamedIndividual.skos:scopeNote: Collated (L3C): Observations combined from a single instrument into a space-time grid.

owl:NamedIndividual.skos:definition: Super-collated (L3S): observations combined from multiple instruments into a space-time grid.
owl:NamedIndividual.skos:scopeNote: Super-collated (L3S): observations combined from multiple instruments into a space-time grid.

owl:NamedIndividual.skos:definition: Uncollated (L3U): L2 data granules remapped to a space grid without combining any observations from overlapping orbits.
owl:NamedIndividual.skos:scopeNote: Uncollated (L3U): L2 data granules remapped to a space grid without combining any observations from overlapping orbits.

owl:NamedIndividual.skos:definition: Data sets created from the analysis of lower level data that result in gridded, gap-free products.
owl:NamedIndividual.skos:scopeNote: Data sets created from the analysis of lower level data that result in gridded, gap-free products.

owl:NamedIndividual.dc:creator: Science and Technology Facilities Council
owl:NamedIndividual.dc:description:
The CCI concept schemes are used to define concepts within an element of a Directory Reference Scheme. There are currently eight concept schemes defined: data type, ecv, frequency, institutes, platforms, platform groups, platform programs, processing levels, products, projects, and sensors. The use of a concept scheme allows easy navigation up and down the tree.

SKOS Navigation Down the Concept Scheme
SKOS Navigation Up the Concept Scheme

As well as being concepts the the concepts are also named individuals of the CCI Ontology classes.

OWL Classes

The CCI concept schemes are used to define concepts within an element of a Directory Reference Scheme. There are currently eight concept schemes defined: data type, ecv, frequency, institutes, platforms, platform groups, platform programs, processing levels, products, projects, and sensors. The use of a concept scheme allows easy navigation up and down the tree.

SKOS Navigation Down the Concept Scheme
SKOS Navigation Up the Concept Scheme

As well as being concepts the the concepts are also named individuals of the CCI Ontology classes.

owl:NamedIndividual.dc:title: Frequency
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: This concept scheme represents the frequencies used by the CCI project
owl:NamedIndividual.skos:definition: Temporal frequencies of data from the ESA Climate Change Initiative (CCI).
